definition: something or someone that provides a source of happiness, take delight in
details:
noun
- something or someone that provides a source of happiness
= synonyms: pleasure
- a feeling of extreme pleasure or satisfaction
= example: a feeling of extreme pleasure or satisfaction
= synonyms: delectation
verb
- take delight in
= example: take delight in
= synonyms: revel
- give pleasure to or be pleasing to
= synonyms: please
- hold spellbound
= synonyms: transport
